Description: This rare guitar is in Excellent condition and the case is brand new! This ESP LTD Limited Edition Graphic Vampire Viper is part of a limited run from 2014. One of only 150 made! The ESP LTD Viper Vampire Biotech Limited Edition Electric Guitar is a truly killer axe with an over the top, head-turning graphic that makes it a great addition to any player’s or collector’s arsenal. A quality mahogany body, mahogany neck with a Thin U neck profile and 24-fret ebony fingerboard gives the Viper Vampire Biotech a fast feel and great tonal qualities. This guitar is mint with the exception of a couple tiny little dings on the back of the body. This guitar is kept in a climate controlled studio at 68 degrees and 50% humidity level. Very little playing time on this instrument, but is setup with a low action for fast playability.  ESP LTD loads this limited edition guitar with EMG 81 and 85 active humbuckers for a hot, high output tone that is ideal for high-gain playing. If you want something completely out of the norm, look no further than the ESP LTD Viper Vampire Biotech! FEATURES: •Construction: Bolt-On •Scale: 24.75 inches •Body: Mahogany •Neck: Mahogany •Fingerboard: Ebony •Nut: 42mm Standard •Neck Contour: Thin U •Frets: 24 XJ •Hardware: Black •Tuners: LTD •Bridge: TOM •Pickups: EMG 81 (B) / 85 (N) Active •Controls:•Master Volume •3-Way Toggle •Master Tone About the artist: The Artist Sam Shearon, also known under the pseudonym Mister-Sam, is an English dark artist born in Liverpool, England. Specializing in horror and science-fiction, his work often includes elements inspired by classic literature including H.P. Lovecraft's The Call of Kthulhu and Oscar Wilde's The Picture of Dorian Grey, both of which he has illustrated. Please contact me with any questions. Items will ship within one business day of cleared payment! Guitar stand in pictures not included. Thank you!
